issue.title: Motor limits unrealistic, motor pos at zero

content.raw:
The motor angle units are in radians, they are, however, behind a large gear box so the numeric values can be very large.

Referencing http://gazebosim.org/haptix, motors 8, 9, 10 and 12 are the finger flex motors. I'll look into why `motor_pos` for these elements are always zero.
content.html:
The motor angle units are in radians, they are, however, behind a large gear box so the numeric values can be very large.

Referencing http://gazebosim.org/haptix, motors 8, 9, 10 and 12 are the finger flex motors. I'll look into why motor_pos for these elements are always zero.
